title: Ep 319: Theo Von, Beat 'Em and Eat 'Em!
itunes:title: Ep 319: Theo Von, Beat 'Em and Eat 'Em!
description:
Bobby sends a snake. Theo gets rattled. Khalyla reminisces about High School colognes. We talk waterslides of pee, cum crystals, Tarzan in Manhattan, Theo's special Regular People, and Bobby preaches to the brothers and sisters. 

Watch Theo's Special 'Regular People': https://www.netflix.com/title/81251389

Follow this week's Singing Competition Winner, Sloane Marenas: https://youtu.be/FwWMVbsqU-Q &  https://www.instagram.com/sloanemarenas

Thank you to our Sponsors: 

Calm: For listeners of the show, Calm is offering a special limited time promotion of 40% off a Calm Premium subscription at CALM.COM/BELLY

Ship Station: It’s never too early to start prepping for the holiday rush, so get a head start with ShipStation. TigerBelly listeners can use  offer code, BELLY, to get a 60-day free trial, just in time for the holidays at https://shipstation.com
